plot outline: A runaway girl gets stuck in the middle of nowhere and is picked up by a middle aged stranger. She reluctantly accepts the offer to stay over night as there is no choice. Later she comes to know that he is her mother's ex-boyfriend and slowly discovers his intentions.
title: Vithaiyadi Naanunakku
plot: A runaway girl gets stuck in the middle of nowhere and is picked up by a middle aged stranger. She reluctantly accepts the offer to stay over night as there is no choice. Later she comes to know that he is her mother's ex-boyfriend and slowly discovers his intentions.
